location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map Jebel Dukham Camp Bahrain Petroleum Company, Bahrain, Persian Gulf’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:500 x 597 mm, on sheet 551 x 640 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Site plan labelled ‘Map #3’ produced on 15 April 1933. Shows the Bahrain Petroleum Company’s camp at Jebel Dukhan with the location of buildings, the oil and water lines marked. Premises labelled for reference with some measurements reported.Oriented with south to the top.
